title: Change in Chinese leaders, impact on econ. policy

content.question: Chinese leaders today differ from those under Mao Zedong in terms of their professional and educational backgrounds as well as their ideology. Describe two differences between today’s Chinese Communist Party leaders and those under Mao. Explain how one of the differences you described has influenced economic policy in China.
